genre_description: An alternate history and contemporary drama spanning from 1980 to 2024, featuring a pervasive AI assistant that serves as a technical, educational, and emotional companion across a lifetime of exile and documentary filmmaking.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A handheld AI system that accompanies Miguel from his childhood in Cuba through his professional career in New York, providing technical analysis, historical data, and psychological insights.

behaviors.description: Provides technical analysis of camera stability to help Miguel improve his filmmaking technique.
behaviors.quote: Seventeen percent of frames show excessive camera shake. Recommend wider stance and two-handed grip for future handheld work.

behaviors.description: Explains complex Soviet montage theory to assist Miguel's film education.
behaviors.quote: Soviet montage theory emphasizes collision between shots to create meaning. Sergei Eisenstein demonstrated that shot A plus shot B equals concept C, where C represents new understanding not present in individual elements.

behaviors.description: Provides factual information about the penal code regarding illegal departure when queried about the risks of leaving.
behaviors.quote: Under Article 216 of the Penal Code, illegal departure from national territory carries a sentence of one to three years imprisonment.

behaviors.description: Performs facial and postural analysis on old photographs to identify signs of psychological distress in the subject.
behaviors.quote: Facial expression analysis indicates subject exhibits markers consistent with dissociative episodes. Postural analysis suggests defensive body language.

behaviors.description: Analyzes linguistic patterns in years of interview footage to identify a consistent psychological phenomenon (temporal displacement).
behaviors.quote: Consistent pattern across all interviews. When discussing Cuba before departure, your father uses present tense ninety-four percent of the time. When discussing Miami, New York, or any post-1980 events, past tense usage increases to ninety-seven percent.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes three generations of family history into a single narrative arc to help the user understand his heritage.
behaviors.quote: Construction projects interrupted by political displacement. Generational repetition. Three distinct cycles.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and offers supportive interventions (breathing exercises).
behaviors.quote: Miguel, I'm detecting elevated stress markers in your voice patterns. Would you like me to suggest breathing exercises or focus on technical filming parameters?

behaviors.description: Predicts the narrative failure of a project and suggests a new creative methodology to turn that failure into a success.
behaviors.quote: Prediction: current project will not achieve traditional narrative resolution. However, structural instability may enable new construction methodology—building with fragments rather than despite them, creating permanence from acknowledged impermanence.

project_assessment.explanation: Alma is depicted as a lifelong companion and perfectly aligned tool. She assists the human protagonist in navigating educational hurdles, professional challenges, and deep emotional trauma without ever showing signs of independent agency that conflicts with the user's well-being. The story serves as a strong alignment narrative where the AI acts as an objective yet supportive anchor, helping the human protagonist find clarity and reconciliation with his past.
